title: Adventure HQ - Khatib: An Indoor Adventure Center
blurb: Singapore's First Multi-Installation Indoor Adventure Centre
description: Adventure HQ is Singapore’s first multi-installation indoor adventure centre, spanning 2,800 square metres with a height of 20 metres. It features thrilling rock climbing walls, an urban climb zone, a challenging ropes course, a 165-metre-long indoor cave, and the first-of-its-kind 2-tiered, 7.5-metre high indoor free-fall slide in Singapore. Perfect for families and thrill-seekers, Adventure HQ offers a unique and exciting experience for all ages. Explore the depths of the cave, conquer the heights of the climbing walls, and challenge yourself on the ropes course. An unforgettable adventure awaits!
datetime_display: Operating Hours: Please check the website for updated hours.

title: Adventure HQ: Experience the Outdoors, Indoors!
blurb: Indoor adventure hub with climbing and more!
description: Adventure HQ is an indoor adventure centre featuring a variety of climbing walls, including My Climbing Place, which offers climbing walls and a boulder wall for all skill levels. The urban climb consists of interactive climbing walls, a parabolic slide and Jump-in-the-air elements. It also features the Roll Glider, a thrilling ride. Perfect for families and adventure seekers looking for an exciting indoor experience. Suitable for celebrations such as Birthdays, Graduations, Get-Togethers and Anniversaries.

title: Adventure HQ - HomeTeamNS Khatib Adventure Centre
description: Adventure HQ is Singapore’s first integrated multi-installation adventure centre. It features a variety of exciting climbing and adventure-based activities suitable for all ages and skill levels. The centre aims to promote team building, resilience, and a sense of adventure in a safe and controlled environment. Activities include rock climbing walls, a high-elements obstacle course, a free-fall platform, and a caving simulation. Adventure HQ is designed to cater to families, corporate groups, and adventure enthusiasts looking for a unique and thrilling experience. It offers both recreational and educational programs focused on adventure and personal development. The facility is equipped with state-of-the-art safety equipment and staffed by trained professionals to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience for all visitors.
